duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide 5-Star Customer Service and assist customers with finding the perfect gown/dress for their event.
Use all systems to manage customer flow and appointments, communicating with customers in a sincere, thoughtful, and encouraging way.
Proactively address customer concerns and know when to escalate to the leadership team.
Maintain store standards and high dress code standards for self.
Perform sales transactions with accuracy, maintain knowledge of procedures, and support the store team in achieving sales goals.
Actively support the store team to achieve operational goals and follow all security processes and policies.

education_certification.credential: High school diploma or equivalent (1 - 2 years prior retail experience preferred)
